metadata.title: CVE-2016-9480 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
libdwarf 2016-10-21 allows context-dependent attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation or cause a denial of service by using the "malformed dwarffile" approach, related to a "Heap Buffer Over-read" issue affecting thedwarf_util.c component, aka DW201611-006.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9480` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20161124-1
libdwarf1 - 20161124-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20161124-1').
